name: places/ChIJg8FSHK1ZwokRYmcCM3mIALI
formattedAddress: 915 Broadway Suite 1208, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 915 Broadway Suite 1208, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
Amazing company, amazing people and amazing talent!
I used brand fire to rebrand my company and take it to the next level, the goal was to create a brand that will be different and modern from the whole industry; BrandFire came with the out of the box thinking and creativity and made it an amazing brand! We work together on some other project and I tell you that, I will not create even a business card without BrandFire.
Working with BrandFire is just priceless, if you dream big and ready to move your business or your personal brand to the big league you should call them.
Don't think about cost, don't think what could go wrong, think about all the things that will go right! Those guys are so hard to find so if you have the opportunity to work with such amazing bunch of people jump on it!!

Moreover, they are honest and personable and for me feel like family.

originalText.text: I've been a loyal Brandfire Customer for a few years and I've always been amazed at the level of creativity and profesionalism they provide.  There is no job too big or too small that isn't met with enthusiasm and the desire to go the extra mile and think outside of the box. In a world where personal attention and time given are rare commodities, The Brandfire team is head and shoulders above the rest in customer service.  Most importantly, the crew at Brandfire are just all around good people, for me, that's priceless.

originalText.text: I work with BrandFire and highly recommend this agency.   We had a complex rebranding effort that required a deep understanding of our unique business focused on the healthcare industry.   The team at BrandFire Adam, Bryan and Casey have been remarkable.  They provided us with a great solution.   Besides being very talented I was deeply impressed with how immersive the process was.  The team poured their heart and soul into this effort.    They were responsive, flexible, and have an instinct.    Could not have been happier with our choice of branding agency and we will be working with BrandFire for many years to come.

originalText.text:
If I could give BrandFire 6 Stars, I would! They have been one of the best business relationships we have made. We found them while doing a Google search for package design and it steamrolled from there. The amount of compliments we get for our logo, packaging and website is unbelievable.
Besides being phenomenally creative, they are also incredibly nice people. We feel like we are part of the family now. Little Bird wouldn't be where it is today if it weren't for the geniuses at BrandFire!

originalText.text: We worked with Brandfire on the rebrand of our business. Adam, Bryan, Casey & the entire Brandfire team are some of the most creative and talented people I have ever partnered with. They are not only fun to work with but the results speak for themselves.
